problem.p: A system consists of two blocks, of masses m and 2m, attached to the ends of a spring with a force constant k. The system is placed on a horizontal frictionless surface. The blocks then are pulled an "extra" distance x apart and simultaneously released from the state of rest. During the subsequent motion of the blocks, what is the maximum speed of block m?
Part 1. Which concepts are most useful in solving this problem?
